titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the maintenance and encrease of the mines of saltpeter, and the true making of gunpowder, and reforming abuses concerning the same
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill ...,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at the Court at White-Hall, the thirteenth day of April, in the first yeere of his Maiesties reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland"--P. 3.
Reproduction of original in the Queen's College (University of Oxford). Library.
